snippet: The National Park Service has again drained the reflecting pool in front of the Lincoln Memorial to clean an algae buildup that formed after a $34 million overhaul.
abstract: National Park Service drains reflecting pool in front of Lincoln Memorial again to clean algae buildup formed after a $34 million overhaul.
lead_paragraph: The National Park Service has again drained the reflecting pool in front of the Lincoln Memorial to clean an algae buildup that formed after a $34 million overhaul.

headline.main: Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool Is Drained
headline.print_headline: Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool Is Drained
